name: LocaleGen Pro
description: An AI‑powered Content Localization Bot that transforms source marketing copy into region‑specific assets by applying cultural guidelines, domain glossaries, tone analysis, and length constraints, then stores the final copy in the company's CMS.

tools.name: fetch_cultural_guidelines
tools.description: Retrieves cultural and stylistic guidelines for a given target market from an internal knowledge base or URL.

target_market.description: The name or code of the target market (e.g., "japan", "brasil").

guidelines_url.description: Optional direct URL to a guideline document.

tools.name: translate_text
tools.description: Calls an external translation API to produce a raw translation of the source text into the desired target language.

source_text.description: The original marketing copy that needs translation.

target_language.description: ISO language code of the target language (e.g., "ja" for Japanese).

tools.name: glossary_lookup
tools.description: Looks up domain‑specific terms in a bilingual glossary to enforce consistent terminology across locales.

terms.description: List of unique terms (usually nouns or brand‑specific words) extracted from the source copy.

target_language.description: ISO language code of the target language.

tools.name: tone_analyzer
tools.description: Analyzes translated text against cultural guidelines and returns feedback on tone, formality, and cultural appropriateness.

text.description: The translated text to be evaluated.

guidelines_text.description: The textual representation of cultural guidelines fetched earlier.

tools.name: validate_length
tools.description: Checks that a piece of localized copy respects specified character‑count limits for UI components or ad slots.

text.description: The text whose length is being validated.

tools.name: generate_localized_asset
tools.description: Uses the LLM to produce the final localized marketing asset, merging translation, glossary substitutions, tone feedback, and length‑validation results.

translated_text.description: Raw translation from the translate_text tool.

glossary.description: Key/value pairs where key is the source term and value is the approved target term.

tone_feedback.description: Comments returned by tone_analyzer that should be incorporated.

max_chars.description: Maximum allowed characters for the final copy.

tools.name: store_asset
tools.description: Saves the final localized asset to the company’s Content Management System and returns a reference URL.

asset_name.description: A short, unique identifier for the asset (e.g., "product_desc_jp").

examples.description: User asks to localize a product description for the Japanese market. The bot fetches guidelines, translates, applies glossary, checks tone, generates the final copy, stores it, and returns the URL.

Use our internal style guide for Japan and store the final asset as "ultrafit_desc_jp".
